<title level="1" right="Action">[Amulet's Abeyance](/Actions.aspx?ID=1229) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 36</row>

**Trigger** The target of your [Exploit Vulnerability](/Actions.aspx?ID=1227) would damage you or an ally within 15 feet of you.

**Requirements** You're holding your amulet implement and are benefiting from Exploit Vulnerability.

</column>

---

You forcefully present your amulet to turn away harm. You or a target ally within 15 feet gain resistance to all damage against the triggering damage. The resistance is equal to 2 + your level.
